name: Burke E Porter Machinery Company Reviews

review.employee-type: Engineer / Field Service / Software / Electrical (Former Employee)
review.title: “Abusive management uses brute force to motivate, will never level with you.”
review.pros: Pros – Company was doing bad during the auto collapse several years ago, but has been on the upswing during past 2-3 years due to new company ownership.
review.cons: Cons – Employee benefits are withheld without cause. People quit because they are forced to travel to a car plant for months at a time, working 12 hour shifts, often in bad areas of foreign countries, under dysfunctional management. Do not expect to join a team of adults working together. There are no adults here.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – You've got everything figured out, so don't change a thing.
